name: Natasha Wierzbicki
text: We loved our waitress! It was a Sunday afternoon and the restaurant was dead. The staff was attentive and the food was fresh. Unfortunately, the food is not what it used to be. The sauce was tasteless and the bread wasn't flavorful. With so â€¦More

name: Tanya Santana
text: You already know what it tastes like. This location had a pleasant staff and I had 2 personal pans and bread sticks in about 10 mins. What more can you ask for???

name: Audrey Hess
text: Service was a little slow and it was cold inside, but the pizza was delicious! (And they turned up the heat so it did warm upðŸ˜Š). They also accommodated our big family nicely.

name: Lee Ryder
text: I love this pizza place. The ambiance is always so nice. It's a really chill place to eat. As for the food it's always hot and fresh. The folks who work here are so very friendly and really do a good job making you feel welcome. This is one of my favorite places to eat.

name: Sharon Stewart
text: Had buffet...great for what it is. PIZZA...PASTA....SALAD BAR. NORMAL THINGS on salad bar...pudding and cookies also...

name: Timothy G
text: Itâ€™s the HUT wish the had Pac-Man and Logan berry IBR

name: bathtub refinishing repair buffalo ny8431
text: We love eating here. Too bad there pizza is not as good as when they first came out. For some reason it doesn't taste the same. But we do love Buffet Night.

name: Kayla Haley
text: They are always fantastic when we go there or have a carry out order. Staff is always friendly and willing to do whatever it takes so you are happy. I've never had an issue getting food here and would absolutely recommend going here!!

name: Amanda Allen
text: Food always great.  Cashiers always friendly.  Orders always ready at the low side of time estimate.

name: Chris Case
text: In town for the night at Motel 6. I order pasta and breadsticks. They did not include utensils. I go outside and catch him before he leaves. He actually brings back utensils. Pretty damn good customer service.

name: BFORTHEV
text: There food is really good and very nice waitress! Must go

name: Hank Williams
text: Service good, pizza not so much. Only go there about once a year, not the way I remember it.

name: Wolf Leader
text: My wife was at work with the car so i called to order delivery for the kids and I and I'm not sure why they have such a TINY delivery "radius". They say they don't deliver to my "area", once I gave my address, they only deliver to â€¦More

text: Ordered online ahead of time. Still had to wait.

text: Great service , friendly staff and atmosphere , good food !!

name: Chris Bouchey
text: Great food excellent service

name: Char B
text: Staff were very polite, helpful, and attentive. Service was timely. Food was what you'd expect from Pizza Hut. It was a 5 star Pizza Hut experience.

name: Adam Ballard
text: Staff is very friendly and helpful. This location just started delivery service so we decided to have pizza delivered to our motel room while in town for work. The driver was fast, friendly, very polite and had a smile on his face the entire time he was here. Our order was hot and delicious. Very satisfied. Thanks Pizza Hut.

name: Brittany Racinowski
text: Karen K was a great hostess!! So kind, attentive and patient with out noisey kiddos

name: Billy French
text: Best Pizza Hut food was amazing clean and comfortable service was Awesome

name: Katie
text: Wonderful service. Clean and good food that met expecrations from past experiences. a+

text: Great service and food! Very quick and friendly!

text: It took literally an hour and a half to deliver a large pizza and bread sticks

name: Daun Milligan
text: AMAZINGLY FRESH & FILLING! U CANT BEAT A LG 3-TOPPING FOR $7.99..

name: Lisa Anne
text:
Ordered a large stuff crust pizza & cinnamon sticks. Used a coupon ðŸ˜Š
I don't know why but the dough was thinner than the box it can in. Are all the pizza doughs like that? The sauce was too tart, was more like a paste than a sauce. Doubt I will order again, sorry.

name: Alec Frampton
text: I like Pizza Hut's taste. I know not everyone agrees, but Pizza Hut has delicious food at good prices. There's almost always a deal, or multiple deals going on at any given time. Pizza Hut is usually speedy about filling orders too â€¦More

text: Fresh pizza at the buffet waitress was nice

text: Always love going here. Even short staffed they show exemplary service and gladly accommodate my party of 10.

name: Jenni Weisedel
text: Always clean. We have the same waitress every time we stop. She's really great!

name: t cas
text: Messed up our entire order. The manager could have cared less.  Will not ever go again!!

name: Jeffrey Martin
text: Very quick service and take out was on time.

name: Mark Wetzel
text: Had the meat lovers pan and it was great. Hadn't been to a Pizza Hut in awhile and just felt like it. Service was good. Food tasted great.

name: Kimba S.
text: Excellent GREAT DELICOUS PIZZA DELIVERED HOT THANK YOU :>)

name: Jonathan Winstead
text: It's your standard pizza hut. Slightly greasy feel inside, but cheap all you can eat pizza and pasta for lunch. Good for a quick bite or for a group.

text: Took out, very nice customer service. Very helpful with a good deal for medium pizzas.

text: Never had my order messed up yet but i only do take out there, never sat down and ate.

text: They (all) got rid of my favorite crust and breadstick flavor! Fiery Red Pepper. I am upset that they dont have it anymore. It was the best creation/flavor they had. â€¦More

text: Went for lunch buffet, lettuce was brown, not edible. Pizza looked like it had been sitting for a while. 2 of the pizzas were the same, both had mushrooms. Not good for someone who has allergies. I will pass on this place next time.

text: I ordered a supreme pizza with a stuffed crust, the waitress kept trying to make me order 2 pizzas.  She was trying to treat me like an idiot just out of the sticks, I was tempted to just walk out.   I will not be tipping when I leave.
